name: Sukiya - Sega Megadrive
description:
Sukiya was to be the sequel to Maupiti Island (a successful game on Atari / Amiga). The development of the game was stopped by the company Lankhor in 1992 and we decided to make an experiment. Is this type of investigate games with voice synthesis possible on Megadrive ?

All ressources (HUD, characters, picture ) were available on the net. Also all dialogues (in french), scenarios but without the chronological sequence.

At the beginning of June, we decided to show our work through a video on our channel youtube ..and it was the Buzz.. We did not think he still had a community around this game.

June 16th, Mr Langlois (founder of Lankhor company) asks us for explanations on this port and asks us not to continue for the moment on the Megadrive.

Yes, 1/4 of a Century later, we can not give life to this unreleased game. 

But the reason is valid, a new version of Maupiti Island is being crowdfunded and if successful, Sukiyashould see the light of day. To avoid reveal the story, we have to wait for a version of the new generation game before doing not the remake but the original work of 1992.

 Original concept game by : Lankhor  Plateform : ATARI ST / AMIGA OCS  Game design :  Sylvian Bruchon
 Graphic Artist : Stephane Polard
